description:
A new tenant is moving into Onodera`s aparment where Haru and Ren used to live, and Ren is helping to clean the room. The man who appears with Onodera is Takamura, the school nurse at Ren`s high school. Meanwhile, a female customer begins showing up at cafe WHITE FANG practically every day to talk to Haru. Aki and Shima realize she`s the girl from the marriage meeting photo, but...?
Source: crunchyroll
